jcr:content.jcr:title: Flag of São Tomé and Príncipe

contentheadline.headline: Flag of São Tomé and Príncipe

contentrichtext.text: {{Merge|São Tomé and Príncipe|date=January 2013}} [[File:Flag of Sao Tome and Principe.svg|thumb|250px|right|Flag of [[São Tomé and Príncipe]]]] The '''flag of São Tomé and Príncipe''', although in the [[Pan-Africanism|Pan-African]] colours, is derived from that of the [[Movement for the Liberation of São Tomé and Príncipe/Social Democratic Party|Liberation Movement]]. The two black stars express the unity of the two islands, while the red represents the struggle for independence. <br clear=all> {{Africa topic|Flag of|title=[[Flags of Africa]]}} {{Nationalflags}}<!-- to edit this table, go to [[Template:Nationalflags]] --> {{DEFAULTSORT:Sao Tome And Principe, Flag of}} [[Category:National symbols of São Tomé and Príncipe|Flag]] [[Category:National flags]] {{Africa-flag-stub}} {{SaoTomePrincipe-stub}}
